price: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] flavored with camphor[3],
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
